ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE,
left( $User.ProfileId , 15) <> left( $Label.Profile_SystemAdministrator , 15),
isnew(),
or( (isblank(Email) && isblank(Phone)),
isblank(FirstName),
isblank(LastName),
ispickval(Persona__c,""),
ispickval(LeadSource,"") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that First and Last Name, Persona, Lead Source, and Email or Phone are filled in.
